AddOnStorageValue.Name: Loginizer_Unauthenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting
AddOnStorageValue.Value: { "Id": "13bad52a-0909-4fbd-9c8c-2519bba38f2a", "Application": "Loginizer", "AffectedVersions": [ "1.3.8-1.3.9" ], "VulnerabilityName": "Unauthenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting", "ExternalReferer": "WPVDB-ID-9088, CVE-2018-11366", "Impact": "High", "Note": "init.php in the Loginizer plugin 1.3.8 through 1.3.9 for WordPress has Unauthenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) because logging is mishandled. This is fixed in 1.4.0." }
